snippet: Each spring visitors flock to a local production of “To Kill a Mockingbird” in author Harper Lee’s hometown.
abstract: Harper Lee play To Kill a Mockingbird is a hit in Harper's hometown of Monroeville, Ala, each spring during so-called play season; this year, all 4,000 tickets to 18 performances were sold in record five days; organizers attribute excitement to news that Lee will publish second novel, Go Set a Watchmen, in summer of 2015.
lead_paragraph: Each spring visitors flock to a local production of “To Kill a Mockingbird” in author Harper Lee’s hometown.

headline.main: ‘To Kill a Mockingbird’ Is a Stage Hit at Home in Monroeville, Ala.
headline.print_headline: Where a Literary Favorite Is a Guaranteed Stage Hit
